6e3ecbaa-29a5-4ba3-9e32-5a560770ea80.text: What is it, my brave leader?

desc.comment: на Лесной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем

(A1) 
(на Лесной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем)

f0088013-476b-46fe-93f1-53e03a6af766.text: ♩ In the pines, in the pines ♪ I love camping in the pines… ♫ Until the wolves go "Wooo", I'll love it in the pines… ♬ Until the night arrives, and I get mauled and die, and crows pluck out my eyes... I'll love it in the pines! ♪

326be21a-64a9-4e49-8a86-f3f5b0394e75.text: {?} I have a personal thing on my mind.

16da15a2-8ee5-4347-a0c4-c1d9eae23a8d.text: Oh, do you now? <With a coy smile, Liris waits for you to continue>

0b3add94-14ff-4104-bfca-e089508a5d7a.text: {!} I want you to have this as a gift... <Give Liris something you think she might enjoy>

17a8a93d-c24d-4aba-add3-c53a36436bac.text: Is this gonna be worth the dramatic buildup, or nah? Just kidding. You're so nice to me!

d08e1a6e-7153-4535-8174-41122769594f.text: You wanna give me a gift? Aww. That's sweet of you.

762008ba-508d-4f85-be84-1df31110606f.text: You are spoiling me, and I'm having a hard time pretending I'm not totally into it. <Bites lower lip>

24015e12-7edb-4465-aa76-a422b2e0592f.text: Aww, $PLAYER.NAME$, that’s so sweet of you—but you literally just gave me one! Not that I’m complaining—I love the attention. But if you keep pampering me so often, moments like this will stop feeling special...

80357aba-f637-4cf5-bf12-e5212a31ead4.text: {Back} On the other hand, let's talk about something else.

bc89c5d8-0cb5-42a2-8817-73e34b5293a9.text: And it was just getting good... <The girl pretends to pout>

5f6818a0-3c82-41a7-9b26-59812fc9eb1f.text: After... after everything? <Liris backs away, dumbstruck, but quickly recovers> S-sure thing. I get it. If that's what you want...

f6567764-d71c-4e1d-8716-7543f514a9bd.text: In t-that case... <She covers her face, hiding fresh tears from your sight> I'll be camping out where we first met. If you still care enough to remember that place...

11f4e98e-b083-470e-86d8-d27dfaa19112.text: What a rotten trick to pull. I nearly believed you were through with me, too.

1cff2d6f-3dc6-4abf-b6a5-99b6ffabdd56.text: You seem to know where you're going, and I'm happy to follow. Why stop and ask me for directions all of a sudden?

7889ca6e-9cba-4618-b3b7-4b5af2d6d6bb.text: Smell you later, as they say. <The girl giggles>

4aa0df5d-3b16-4f75-8e32-95ce6b5fa1fe.text: Our chats always boost my mood. So talk to me again soon, okay?

aaca4063-8756-4755-a578-9e951eec4da1.text: <With a coy little wink, Liris returns to business as usual—but the warmth of her loving gaze lingers on you a moment longer>

a96613fd-423b-4f0a-b8c2-99496c61bc3d.text: Love ya... <Liris softly whispers, as you part ways>

desc.comment: на Лесной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем
на Горно-лесной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем

(на Горно-лесной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем)

c93591e6-8434-4bf9-ab92-9662db10e7b3.text: Yikes. That’s a very long drop from these cliffs. So please, watch your step, okay? And if you do slip, maybe don’t immediately grab the nearest traveling companion as your personal safety rail?

desc.comment: на Горно-лесной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем
на Равнинной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем

(A1) 
(на Равнинной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем)

84f22cdf-b8e3-47ec-be23-b5e1422fd384.text: Ughh… So flat… So open… Feeling vulnerable… Need tree cover, stat! The flowers are pretty, though. Maybe I should camouflage myself with a tasteful wreath?

desc.comment: на Равнинной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем
на Равнинной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем

481c787d-953d-4c94-97ca-dce789fd39ac.text: I hate fields. When I was little, a farm boy stole my Pork Lad. And the only thing I ever took from him… was a kiss. Tragic, ain't it?

desc.comment: на Равнинной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем
на Болотной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем

(A1) 
(на Болотной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем)

992f81df-81f3-4fd6-8f0c-e3f2382e013d.text: It's dank, it stinks, but you have to agree, swamps are majestic, sort of. I wonder if we'll meet a kindly turtle! But that's just my empty stomach talking…

desc.comment: на Болотной Случайке. Включая обычные зедки и карту с лагерем

(A1) 
(на любой локации, которая не указана выше)

7161ed8f-5f8f-4511-bd85-9879b49160c8.text: Eh? I dunno. First time I'm seeing this place. Looks kind of lame.

3f081497-304d-4163-8eb8-b46673a5a008.text: This here's Smelters' Row! We're so close to Swordhaven proper, I can almost smell the clueless moneybags—ahem—I mean, the easily... mug-able snobs—ahem! I mean... folks! Regular, ordinary people! Yeah.

bf2d930d-9068-498e-ae46-eb525b7a92ba.text: These are the Swordhaven outskirts—which means we're just a few steps, a couple bribes, or... the occasional unsavoury favor away from waltzing right into the city proper!

54c2cf8f-c955-466e-b503-f43ef437afeb.text: That's a beautiful beach. Gods, I hope you didn't bring me here for a chance to gawk at my bare feet...

3e69f252-c8dd-410e-a5dd-8cd6dddac0e9.text: That’s a lovely beach. I do hope you didn’t bring me here for skinny-dipping, though. We're not quite there yet in our relationship, buddy.

f1941f66-5695-4927-907e-e286623fed00.text: Mmm... smells like lizard guts and hay, with just a hint of fishy sacrifice wafting in from that idol over yonder. Delightful. Thanks for the tour. You are a true friend.

6d80f808-1574-45a9-9309-f13369ab7469.text: It’s like whoever built this village was very new at the whole ‘village-making’ thing... Hope they improved with practice!

06703b8d-e7fa-4a25-a7c8-92c2757347af.text: You can almost smell the pain of folks who got jumped outta nowhere and crammed into this place like barn animals... I can see them now—trying to sneak past guards or make a break for wherever the confiscated gear ended up...

7e8b11bc-65ce-4e85-9959-607566bf13fb.text: This is Grainhold. Dad brought me here when I was a kid—crystal smuggling, old men wailing about hairy legs, stingy ferrymen, and bees. Oh gods, the bees. I got stung so many times trying to yoink some honey, I think I'm fully immune to their poison now.

desc.comment: в Спайдер Кейве. Снаружи и в Подземке

(A1) 
(в Спайдер Кейве. Снаружи и в Подземке)

58d3fd53-0b59-4b8f-90b9-48815a66dd81.text: Now why exactly did you bring me out here? You know I despise spiders. They’re, like, aggressively gross.

desc.comment: в Вайпер Шоале. Снаружи и в Подземке

(A1) 
(в Вайпер Шоале. Снаружи и в Подземке)

b8ecbc1c-ecb6-4366-ac7e-0abcd78a7f23.text: Ugh, can we please not waste time chatting right now? I can only pretend these snakes are wiggly strands of living rope for so long. After that, I’m basically self-destructing. From sheer terror, no less!

desc.comment: в Вайпер Шоале. Снаружи и в Подземке
в Логове Снатчера. Снаружи и в Подземке

(A1) 
(в Логове Снатчера. Снаружи и в Подземке)

433525d8-cbd6-42a9-95bd-56429887fb19.text: Wanna know my opinion about this place, all mashed up into a single word? Here it is: "Ew". Makes my head hurt. Fingers crossed sweet old Viltyb brews up one of his vaguely effective anti-headache teas soon… wait—hold on, that doesn’t sound quite right—uhhh…

desc.comment: в Логове Снатчера. Снаружи и в Подземке
в Руинах Крессетвола. Снаружи и в Подземке

(A1) 
(в Руинах Крессетвола. Снаружи и в Подземке)

eaf8b106-0938-4243-8188-b27d11fc901e.text: Wow, faith really did move mountains back in the day. I mean, the first settlers hadn’t even finished slaughtering, looting and colonizing, and they were already throwing up monumental cathedrals like this one? That’s some prioritization.

desc.comment: в Руинах Крессетвола. Снаружи и в Подземке

5ba5e67c-c1bb-4746-b7d2-eab55ec95ba8.text: <You startle Liris, as she is staring off into the distance> Oh! Yes, $PLAYER.NAME$?

dacd7343-91d2-49f8-8644-117df0fd993d.text: Oh, dad... What were you thinking? <Liris notices your stare> I'm sorry. I was just... No matter. Did you want something?

1701e322-7df9-4908-bf81-b8249c12c888.text: Oh, hey! What's on your mind, $PLAYER.NAME$?

c3bd7e5f-8467-4bbf-805a-997394967528.text: <Sensing you are about to talk to her, Liris smiles shyly> Yeah?

89d57d9b-7b51-406b-90a8-c101f4f8a41f.text: <Liris meets your eyes with a soft, lingering gaze—quiet, hopeful, and shimmering with something unspoken> $PLAYER.NAME$?
